TripReportSettings.description: schema for trip report settings configuration

TripReportSettingsRequest.description: request schema to change trip report settings configuration

TripReportSettingsResponse.description: response schema to change trip report settings configuration

DefaultTripReportSettings.description: schema for trip report default settings configuration

DefaultTripReportSettingsRequest.description: request schema to change default trip report settings configuration

DefaultTripReportSettingsResponse.description: response schema to change default trip report settings configuration

GetAllTripsResponse.description: schema for get All Trips Details Between Durations Url

TripDetailsResponse.description: schema for get Trip Details given tripid

message.description: Error message the possible values can be - User not authorized
description of the error response, values can be - Resource Not Found
description of the error response, values can be - Internal Server Error
Description of the error message - possible values can be Proxy Integration Failed

post.summary: FCL_S116_SC002 | Update default trip report settings configuration
post.description: This API is used to configure the default trip report settings from the user channel (mobile app)

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: unique identifier of user - Gigya id for user

parameters.name: x-clientapp-version
parameters.description: Version of the client applications software

parameters.name: clientrequestid
parameters.description: To be generated by Client (Last 10 digits of uid_epoch_6digit random)

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: Locale of user. Coded according to ISO-639 (e.g. “en”) and optionally extended by a country code (e.g. “en_US”).

parameters.name: x-device-id
parameters.description: An identifier that uniquely identifies the client device, or calling system like IMEI code. optional for webapp

parameters.name: x-originator-type
parameters.description: The originating clients type: app, web ,server
